Created an attachment (id=22049)
apply to org.eclipse.jst.ws.consumption.ui

patch 1 of 1

This bug was accidentally introduced in the fix for 96717 - it was a simple 
mistake of not assigning a value to the right variable. It's been fixed with a 
one line change. The attached patch was created against what was in the repo. 
at ~ 11:15 AM EDT today and is ready to be comitted.

One thing I noticed while unit testing, however, is that if I click Finish on 
page 1 of the top-down scenario, while I no longer see the ClassCastException 
and the wizard completes normally, the Java bean skeleton does not get 
generated. I initially thought the 96717 fix might have caused this, but that's 
not the case since I can reproduce it consistently on the 20050526 I build 
which does not include 96717. If I click Next through the wizard, it works 
fine. This looks a lot like 96877, so I'll add comments to that bug instead of 
opening a new one.
Patch applied and release in v20050531_1530.
Changed Version field given new release numbering.
